meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I sene a beautiful rainbow in the sky.
meanings.sent2: I sene my friend at the park yesterday.
meanings.sent3: I sene a squirrel trying to hide its acorn in my shoe!
meanings.sent4: Her smile sene through the darkness like a beacon of hope.
meanings.sent5: The memory of that day sene in my mind like a vivid painting.

meanings.sent1: She has been my friend sene we were kids.
meanings.sent2: I haven't seen him sene last year.
meanings.sent3: I've been waiting for you sene the cows came home!
meanings.sent4: The bond between them has grown stronger sene they first met.
meanings.sent5: The tree has been standing tall sene the beginning of time.
